com.observability.monitoring.server

Class NotificationEMail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.observability.monitoring.server.NotificationEMail

  • public class NotificationEMail
extends java.lang.Object
    NotificationEMail is a class that can send emails through a predefined SMTP server.
    1. Using Gmail as SMTP server: smtp.gmail.com
    2. Sending account: observabilityalert@gmail.com
    3. Secure connection: TLS

    Author:
    Ying (Joel) Gao

    History:
    1. Created Jun 07 2015

      • sendEMail

        public boolean sendEMail(java.util.List<java.lang.String> recipients,
                java.lang.String msgsubject,
                java.lang.String msgcontent,
                boolean html)
        Send email to recipients.

        Parameters:
        recipients - list of recipients
        msgsubject - subject of the email
        msgcontent - content of the email
        html - whether using HTML email or not
        Returns:
        true/false
